Name: Copter Strike VR
About the game: Copter Strike is waiting for approval in the Oculus AppLab, it will come for both Quest 1 and Quest 2 standalone platforms as well. There will be crossplay between PCVR and Standalone. Copter Strike is a thrilling virtual reality game that immerses players in intense, highly fun and addictive multiplayer helicopter battles. With realistic controls and a complex HUD, players can pilot their choppers with precision as they engage in fast-paced dogfights. The game features a variety of multiplayer game modes, including deathmatch, multi-team deathmatch, domination, multi-team domination and a co-op zombie outbreak mode. The low-poly environment provides a visually stunning backdrop for the action, with the added challenge of avoiding crashes and obstacles. In Copter Strike, players have the ability to take out their enemies with a combination of turret control and rocket fire. The intense gameplay is made even more immersive with radio voice chat, allowing players to coordinate with their team and strategize in real-time. Whether playing solo or with friends, Copter Strike is a must-play for fans of fun, action-packed virtual reality games. Click here to join Copter Strike small but growing community Discord for support or to share your feedback, suggestions and meet new pilots!
